param.vsli:raw: Specifies the child ID of the accessible element.

member.param: 指定可访问元素的子 ID。

param.name: ppIDString
param.vsli:raw: Pointer to a buffer that receives the identity string. The callee allocates this buffer using <see langword="CoTaskMemAlloc" />. When finished, the caller must free the buffer by calling <see langword="CoTaskMemFree" />.

member.param: 指向用于接收标识字符串的缓冲区的指针。 被调用方使用 分配此缓冲区。 完成后，调用方必须通过调用 来释放缓冲区。

param.name: pdwIDStringLen
param.vsli:raw: Pointer to a buffer that receives the length of the identity string.

member.param: 指向用于接收标识字符串长度的缓冲区的指针。

param.name: AnnoScope
param.vsli:raw: May be ANNO_THIS, indicating that the annotation affects the indicated accessible element only; or ANNO_CONTAINER, indicating that it applies to the element and its immediate element children.

member.param: 可以为 ANNO_THIS，指示批注仅影响所指示的可访问元素；也可以为 ANNO_CONTAINER，指示批注应用于元素及其直接子元素。

member.param: 可以为 ANNO_THIS，指示批注仅影响所指示的可访问元素；也可以为 ANNO_CONTAINER，指示批注应用于元素及其直接子元素。

param.vsli:raw: Specifies the object ID.

param.vsli:raw: Specifies the address of a pointer variable that receives the address of the object's IAccessible interface.

member.name: M:Accessibility.IAccIdentity.GetIdentityString(System.UInt32,System.IntPtr,System.UInt32@)

summary.vsli:raw: The <see cref="T:Accessibility.IAccIdentity" /> and all of its exposed members are part of a managed wrapper for the Component Object Model (COM) <see langword="IAccIdentity" /> interface.

member.summary: 及其公开的所有成员都属于组件对象模型 (COM) 接口的托管包装的一部分。

param.name: dwIDChild
param.vsli:raw: Specifies which child of the IAccessible object the caller wants to identify.

member.param: 指定调用方要标识的 IAccessible 对象的子级。

param.name: ppIDString
param.vsli:raw: Address of a variable that receives a pointer to a callee-allocated identity string. The callee allocates the identity string using <see langword="CoTaskMemAlloc" />; the caller must release the identity string by using <see langword="CoTaskMemFree" /> when finished.

member.param: 一个变量的地址，该变量用于接收指向被调用方分配的标识字符串的指针。 被调用方使用 分配标识字符串；在此操作完成后，调用方必须使用 释放该标识字符串。

param.name: pdwIDStringLen
param.vsli:raw: Address of a variable that receives the length, in bytes, of the callee-allocated identity string.

member.param: 一个变量的地址，该变量用于接收被调用方分配的标识字符串的长度（以字节为单位）。

member.name: T:Accessibility.IAccPropServer

summary.vsli:raw: The <see cref="T:Accessibility.IAccPropServer" /> and all of its exposed members are part of a managed wrapper for the Component Object Model (COM) <see langword="IAccPropServer" /> interface.

member.summary: 及其公开的所有成员都属于组件对象模型 (COM) 接口的托管包装的一部分。

member.name: M:Accessibility.IAccPropServer.GetPropValue(System.Byte@,System.UInt32,System.Guid,System.Object@,System.Int32@)

summary.vsli:raw: The <see cref="T:Accessibility.IAccPropServer" /> and all of its exposed members are part of a managed wrapper for the Component Object Model (COM) <see langword="IAccPropServer" /> interface.

member.summary: 及其公开的所有成员都属于组件对象模型 (COM) 接口的托管包装的一部分。

param.name: pIDString
param.vsli:raw: Contains a string that identifies the property being requested.

member.param: 包含一个标识所请求的属性的字符串。

param.name: dwIDStringLen
param.vsli:raw: Specifies the length of the identity string specified by the <paramref name="pIDString" /> parameter.

member.param: 指定由 参数指定的标识字符串的长度。

param.name: idProp
param.vsli:raw: Specifies a GUID indicating the desired property.

member.param: 指定一个 GUID，它指示所需的属性。

param.name: pvarValue
param.vsli:raw: Specifies the value of the overridden property. This parameter is valid only if <paramref name="pfHasProp" /> is TRUE. The server must set this to VT_EMPTY if <paramref name="pfHasProp" /> is set to FALSE.

member.param: 指定重写属性的值。 此参数仅在 为 TRUE 时有效。 如果 设置为 FALSE，则服务器必须将此参数设置为 VT_EMPTY。

param.name: pfHasProp
param.vsli:raw: Indicates whether the server is supplying a value for the requested property. The server should set this to TRUE if it is returning an overriding property or to FALSE if it is not returning a property (in which case it should also set <paramref name="pvarValue" /> to VT_EMPTY).

member.param: 指示服务器是否为请求的属性提供值。 如果服务器返回一个重写属性，则应将此值设置为 TRUE；如果服务器未返回一个属性，则应将此值设置为 FALSE（在此情况下，还应将 设置为 VT_EMPTY）。

param.name: ppIDString
param.vsli:raw: Pointer to a buffer that receives the identity string. The callee allocates this buffer using <see langword="CoTaskMemAlloc" />. When finished, the caller must free the buffer by calling <see langword="CoTaskMemFree" />.

param.vsli:raw: Pointer to a buffer that receives the length of the identity string.

param.name: hmenu
param.vsli:raw: Identifies the HMENU-accessible element to be annotated.

member.param: 标识要批注的 HMENU 可访问元素。

param.name: idChild
param.vsli:raw: Identifies the accessible element that is to be annotated. This replaces the identity string.

member.param: 标识要批注的可访问元素。 这会替换标识字符串。

param.name: paProps
param.vsli:raw: Specifies an array of properties that is to be handled by the specified callback object.

member.param: 指定要由指定回调对象处理的属性数组。

param.name: cProps
param.vsli:raw: Specifies the number of properties in the <paramref name="paProps" /> array.

member.param: 指定 数组中的属性数。

param.name: pServer
param.vsli:raw: Specifies the callback object, which will be invoked when a client requests one of the overridden properties.

member.param: 指定将在客户端请求一个已重写属性时调用的回调对象。

param.name: AnnoScope
param.vsli:raw: May be ANNO_THIS, indicating that the annotation affects the indicated accessible element only; or ANNO_CONTAINER, indicating that it applies to the element and its immediate element children.

member.param: 可以为 ANNO_THIS，指示批注仅影响所指示的可访问元素；也可以为 ANNO_CONTAINER，指示批注应用于元素及其直接子元素。
